import React, { useState } from "react"; const Form = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ name: "", gender: "", age: "", work: "", residence: "", marriage: "", bmi: 0.0, smoking: "", avg_glucose_level: "", }); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; let parsedvalue; if (name === 'age') { parsedvalue = parseInt(value) } if (name === 'bmi') { parsedvalue = value.replace(/[^0-9.]/g, '').replace(/^0+(?=\d)/, ''); } else { parsedvalue = value } setFormData((prevData) => ({ ...prevData, [name]: parsedvalue, })); console.log(name, parsedvalue); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); // Handle form submission logic here console.log(formData); }; return (

); }; export default Form;
